summary: Tired of running around with tons of steel ingots, but no nails to build your house?
descriptionHtml:
I was tired of not being able to construct my house, because i was lacking iron ingots to craft some nails, although i carried dozens of steel ingots with me.

So i decided, steel nails are even better than iron nails!

This mod adds the ability to craft 12 nails out of one steel ingot.


Of course Hearthfire is required. Without houses, there is no need for nails.
author: Maverick-106
